Name: Chandrasekhar Kurita
Description: Born 2994. A member of a cadet branch of House Kurita, Chandrasekhar is a distant cousin to the current Coordinator, Takashi Kurita. Unlike most Kuritan family members, Chandrasekhar chose not to follow a military career, making him a failure at the eyes of Takashi and the royal court at Luthien.
ReputationStatements: Despicable as you are, House Kurita can still find a use for your services. Attend, Commander: your betters have need of you.
You work for pay, do you not? House Kurita has plenty of money for you, mercenary. Simply be quick and efficient about it—we have little time for your kind.
You are not of our blood, mercenary, but your skills are robust enough. We would grant you money and renown if you aided us.
House Kurita respects your martial prowess, mercenary. Aid us, and we will ensure you are well paid for your efforts.
Once again, the Draconis Combine requires your assistance, mercenary. You have served us well in the past, so we would like to entrust you with this mission.
My friend, you know we bring you only the contracts worthy of your talents. So it is that I offer you this—and payment that you will find is more than fair.
I apologize for disturbing you, my friend, but the Draconis Combine once again needs your help. Undertake this task for us, and I will see that you are richly rewarded.
MissionSuccessStatements: Ah Commander, your skills a warrior brings you great glory and for me a generous profit. Well done.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Maybe it's time we start rethinking our arrangement, Commander. Like karma, financial losses must be dealt with.
